verbs.description: no answer for blake griffin in [ARGM-MNR: gut] - [V: wrenching] [ARG0: loss] the sixers had no answers all night long for blake griffin as they allowed him to score 50 points in a heartbreaking 133 - 132 overtime loss to the pistons by matt haughton fultz markelle fultz pistons drummond jj redick joel embiid sixers blake griffin ben simmons j j redick robert covington
